positions.subtitle: Radhakrishnan Hall of Residence
positions.description: • Elected by more than 500 Hall Boarders as a representative at Students Senate level and entrusted with a budget of over INR 2.7 Lakh.• Responsible for room allocation of 500+ boarders and organization of Hall day event which saw a footfall of 2000+ students and faculties.• Instrumental in stimulating Music Room and Library Renovation project and conceptualized the work schedule of Sweeping staff for efficient work flow.• Revamped library book issue and purchase structure and initiated magazine subscription for hall library.
positions.title: Coordinator Maintenance
positions.description_html:
• Elected by more than 500 Hall Boarders as a representative at Students Senate level and entrusted with a budget of over INR 2.7 Lakh.
• Responsible for room allocation of 500+ boarders and organization of Hall day event which saw a footfall of 2000+ students and faculties.
• Instrumental in stimulating Music Room and Library Renovation project and conceptualized the work schedule of Sweeping staff for efficient work flow.
• Revamped library book issue and purchase structure and initiated magazine subscription for hall library.

positions.subtitle: Prithvi IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: • Conducted Online Geoclick and Minrex event of the Fest 2020• Responsible for Design and Creative work of Web Pages, Social Profiles and various events.• Contacted to the various companies and colleges for sponsorships and participations respectively in Prithvi 2020
